person.persName: James E. Stone, Sr. (Hancock County, Kentucky, minister and court clerk.)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, minister and court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine D. Lewis Stone in Hancock County on October 1, 1835. Father of Ann M. Stone, Mary E. Stone, Francis W. Stone, Catherine M. Stone, Stephen W. D. Stone, and James E. Stone, Jr. Court clerk and Baptist minister in Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Hancock County in 1850. Court clerk in Hancock County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Hancock County in 1860.
